name: Ornate Kabuto
title: Bygone Lightning: Ornate Kabuto
desc: "Thirteen years went by like a dream. The scarlet snow flies through the shadowed pass like smoke. You have now gone afar."
in_play_description: After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Energy.

skills.desc: After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Energy. (A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
